pageTitle: Itinerary for Friday, January 12, 2018 | Prime Minister of Canada
articleHtml:
Itinerary for the Prime Minister, Justin Trudeau, for Friday, January 12, 2018:

London, Ontario

8:30 a.m. The Prime Minister will attend the Cabinet meeting.

London Convention Centre
300 York Street

Note for media:

  • On-site coverage of the Cabinet retreat open to accredited media only. If you have not obtained accreditation in advance, please present yourself to the accreditation desk located outside Salon J of the Convention Centre.

2:15 p.m. The Prime Minister will hold a media availability.

Salon H
London Convention Centre
300 York Street

Notes for media:

  • Open to accredited media only. If you have not obtained accreditation in advance, please present yourself to the accreditation desk located outside Salon J of the Convention Centre.
  • Media should arrive no later than 1:15 p.m.
